matrix.db
Class Vault

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.ErrorObject
        |
        +--matrix.db.Vault
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageProvider, java.io.Serializable
public class Vault
extends ErrorObject

A Vault is a container for Matrix objects.

See Also:
